name: Bomberbot
overview: Gabriele Amore, a prominent figure in the ZX Spectrum homebrew scene, has once again captivated enthusiasts with his latest creation – Bomber Bot. This game delivers a delightful arcade experience for the entire family on the ZX Spectrum. Drawing inspiration from the classic Bomber Man, Bomber Bot takes players on a thrilling adventure. In the words of Planet Sinclair (translated), "Bomber Bot, reminiscent of timeless classics like Bomber Man and Eric and the Floaters, offers a unique narrative. In this game, players are tasked with liberating our planet from an alien menace that has targeted our nuclear power plants. These extraterrestrial invaders, resembling colossal octopuses, can be neutralized with well-placed bombs – a task that demands strategic precision and quick reflexes, lest we too fall victim to their onslaught.
